item.title: How to Find Your Unique Edge - Melodity
item.description: Do your covers sound like every other musician? Does it feel like something is just missing, like the spark in your cover isn’t lighting up? Maybe it’s time to try and find your unique edge. This guide is going to show you how to experiment with different genres and styles of music/singing to find your sweet spot, then incorporate them into your songs.

item.title: How to Find Local Open Mics - Melodity
item.description: It is not easy to get up in front of a crowd and sing, but this how-to guide is going to provide you with everything you need to help you be a success. From finding the right type of open mic for your genre and skill level to giving you all the pro tips you might not have thought of. After all, no one wants to be a little teen popstar singing a love song in a biker bar.

item.title: Networking for Introverts - Melodity
item.description: If you’re like me and utterly hate talking to people, then I bet you are already cringing from this article. But fear not my fellow turtles! This article has all the tricks for networking, without actually having to network!

item.title: Why You Need a Fanbase - Melodity
item.description: A fanbase is one of the most important tools any musician can have. Fans not only support your music, buy your merchandise, and come to your shows, but they can also give you a community. Having a loyal fanbase will help you make money, get bigger gigs, and help you get even more fans.
